name: Raftaar
description: '''Dilin Nair{{Efn|Although in a video Raftaar agrees that his name is '''Kalathil Kuzhiyil Devadasan Dilin Nair''',<ref>{{Cite web |date=6 July 2023 |title=Raftaar - The Malayali Swag |url=https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=G9jOgP7ISEM&pp=ygUbcmFmdGFhciBtYWxheWFsYW0gaW50ZXJ2aWV3 |access-date=6 July 2023 |website=YouTube |publisher=Radio City India |quote=from 0:25 to 0:35}}</ref> his business filings list his name as '''Dilin Nair'''.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Dilin Nair - Director information |url=https://www.zaubacorp.com/director/DILIN-NAIR/07511292}}</ref> The Wikipedia introduction uses only the legal name. |name=a1}}''' (born 16 November 1988), better known by his stage name '''Raftaar''', is an Indian rapper, lyricist, music producer, composer, dancer, actor and TV personality associated with [[Hindu music|Hindi]], [[Music of Punjab|Punjabi]] and [[Haryanvi music|Haryanvi]] music. He is among the first rappers in India to break into the mainstream music industry.
